Instruction: Turn on your thermometer by pressing the power button.
ReadingInstruction: Place the thermometer's probe in your ear and press the capture button.

Instruction: Press the ‘Start’ button on your A&D monitor to start a blood pressure measurement. Please be still and quiet until your measurement is complete.
PairingInstruction: Press and hold the ‘Start’ button on your A&D monitor until ‘Pr’ is displayed.
ReadingInstruction: Press the ‘Start’ button on your A&D monitor to start a blood pressure measurement. Please be still and quiet until your measurement is complete.

Instruction: Press the power button on your blood pressure monitor to start a measurement.
ReadingInstruction: Please be still and quiet until your blood pressure measurement is complete.

Instruction: Wear the heart rate monitor to make it visible.
ReadingInstruction: Please be patient while your heart rate data is captured. This can take up to 60 seconds.

Instruction: Wear the heart rate monitor to make it visible.
ReadingInstruction: Please be patient while your heart rate data is captured. This can take up to 60 seconds.

Instruction: Press and hold the button to the right of the watch’s face until 'Find' is displayed.
ReadingInstruction: Please be patient while your heart rate data is captured. This can take up to 60 seconds.

Instruction: Wear the heart rate monitor to make it visible.
ReadingInstruction: Please be patient while your heart rate data is captured. This can take up to 60 seconds.

Instruction: Step on your scale to turn it on then step off.
ReadingInstruction: Please step on your scale. Once your weight is captured you can step off.

Instruction: Turn on your thermometer by pressing the power button.
ReadingInstruction: Place the thermometer's probe in your ear and press the capture button.

Instruction: Attach the pulse oximeter to your finger.
PairingInstruction: Attach the pulse oximeter to your finger.
ReadingInstruction: Please be patient while your pulse oximetry is captured. This can take up to 10 seconds.

Instruction: Stand on your scale. Step off your scale when 'Step off' is displayed.
PairingInstruction: Press and hold the 'Set' button on the under side of your scale until ‘Pr’ is displayed.
ReadingInstruction: Stand on your scale. Step off your scale when 'Step off' is displayed.

Instruction: Press and release the top, middle button, marked with a dot.
PairingInstruction: Press and release the top, middle button on the glucose meter, marked with a dot and when prompted enter the last 6 digits of the serial number located on the back of the glucose meter.
ReadingInstruction: Downloading

Instruction: Step on your scale.
ReadingInstruction: Once your weight is captured you can step off.

Instruction: Step on your scale.
ReadingInstruction: Once your weight is captured you can step off.

Instruction: Turn on the thermometer and take your temperature.
ReadingInstruction: Please wait while your temperature reading is being received.

Instruction: Press the power button. Your blood pressure measurement will begin shortly. Please be still and quiet.
ReadingInstruction: Receiving your blood pressure measurement.

Instruction: Hold down the left-side slider until the blue light is on.
PairingInstruction: Hold down the left-side slider until the blue light is on.
ReadingInstruction: Receiving your blood glucose measurements.

Instruction: Stand on your scale. Once your weight is captured you can step off.
PairingInstruction: Press the button on the under side of your scale to turn it on, then press and hold it until you see the Bluetooth icon blinking on the scale's display.
ReadingInstruction: Stand on your scale. Once your weight is captured you can step off.

Instruction: Press the power button. Your blood pressure measurement will begin shortly. Please be still and quiet.
PairingInstruction: Press and hold the power button on the device until you see the Bluetooth icon blinking on the display.
ReadingInstruction: Press the power button. Your blood pressure measurement will begin shortly. Please be still and quiet.

Instruction: Press OK to power on. If already on, turn off by holding OK until off, then press again to power on.
PairingInstruction: Press OK to power on. Select Settings / Wireless / Pairing / Pair Device.
ReadingInstruction: Receiving readings.

Instruction: Press the ‘START’ button to start a blood pressure measurement. Please be still and quiet until your measurement is complete.
PairingInstruction: Remove batteries from the device. Press the START/STOP button three times. Place batteries back in device.
ReadingInstruction: Press the ‘START’ button to start a blood pressure measurement. Please be still and quiet until your measurement is complete.

Instruction: Press the power button. Attach the pulse oximeter to your finger.
ReadingInstruction: Please be patient while your pulse oximetry is captured. This can take up to 10 seconds.

Instruction: Stand on your scale. Once your weight is captured you can step off.
ReadingInstruction: Once your weight is captured you can step off.

Instruction: Stand on your scale. Once your weight is captured you can step off.
PairingInstruction: Remove batteries from the device. Place batteries back in device.
ReadingInstruction: Once your weight is captured you can step off.
